name: downup
description: Tiny listener for numerical value changes.
author: rayfranco <fbouly@gmail.com> (http://rayfran.co)

scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.postbrowserify:
cat build/downup.js | pbcopy && echo "/*!
 * downup.js
 * https://github.com/rayfranco/downup
 *
 * Copyright 2015 Franco Bouly
 * Released under the MIT license
 */
" > build/downup.js && pbpaste >> build/downup.js
scripts.postuglify:
cat build/downup.min.js | pbcopy && echo "/*!
 * downup.js
 * https://github.com/rayfranco/downup
 *
 * Copyright 2015 Franco Bouly
 * Released under the MIT license
 */
" > build/downup.min.js && pbpaste >> build/downup.min.js
